amendment.description: Page 375, strike line 19 and all that follows through page 376, line 6.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 222 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike Sec. 133, which prohibits Treasury from enforcing rule or guideline implementing the Treasury guidance that ends US support of multilateral development bank funding for new overseas coal projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A172) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A172) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A172) offered by Mr. Kildee.
